data.title: Sidney Toler
data.meta_description: Sold for $1,675 | Screen actor (1874–1947) best known for his recurring role as Charlie Chan. Vintage matte-finish 8 x 10 photo, signed and inscribed in
data.text:
Description

Signing for a star of Son of Frankenstein

Screen actor (1874–1947) best known for his recurring role as Charlie Chan. Vintage matte-finish 8 x 10 photo, signed and inscribed in fountain pen “To Donnie Dunagan, Sidney Toler as ‘Chan.’” The inscribee (born 1934) played Peter, the young son of Wolf and Elsa von Frankenstein, in the 1939 film Son of Frankenstein, In fine condition, with a single tack hole to each corner and a couple of light corner tip creases. RRAuction COA.
